body: Burin, Thanks for posting the file.  I was able to fix the bug.  It seems that it resulted from some code that Mostapha put in the North angle function, which I will admit I do not fully understand but it seemed unnecessary so I took it out. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/E-eiwesnIS0AkqBwrY-bzcFkL3hYfmXiIM*Pj0SDB3uOUxzaAhvm7qyQqJDLkINCrQn3vuNHPbtn-za8tgpxbCPfnxEsBaM-/NorthIsValid.PNG) You can find the fixed component on the github and in the attached file. -Chris
